sentence: READ MORE: Supreme Court set to give the most extremist movement in the US a big win and it's not abortion Ron DeSantis and Greg Abbott stood right beside him, pushing through laws to prevent the next generation of potential white terrorists he hoped to influence with his manifesto? from learning the true racial history of America in public schools.
author: Thom Hartmann
title: The Buffalo terrorist didn't shoot alone
